data.title: Free Zoos and Aquarium Admission
data.meta_description: When you become a member of one of more than 230 zoos and aquariums partnered with AZA,  you'll also receive free or discounted admission to other AZA zoos and aquariums. Learn more about our reciprocal admissions program and sign up today to become a member and start saving.
data.text:
AZA Reciprocal Admissions Program

By becoming a member of your local AZA-accredited zoo or aquarium, you can gain access to discounted admissions to other AZA-accredited zoos and aquariums that choose to participate in our Reciprocal Admissions Program.

Here is the list of participating zoos and aquariums (PDF) for May 2024 - April 2025.

Please refer to the program guidelines below. Note that policies may vary across zoos and aquariums. As such, we always recommend calling ahead to confirm. Contact details for each participating zoo and aquarium are included in the PDF above.
